themes: As an user not using a mouse, I want to browse with keyboard only
items.title: Use the application functionalities with a keyboard
attendu: As a keyboard only user, I want to use the application
gestion: All the interactive elements must be reachable via a Keyboard navigation
All the interactive elements must be usable via a Keyboard navigation
acceptance:
Given that I use a keyboard,

When I use any functionality,

Then I get a equivalent result with mouse or keyboard navigation
dev: Be able to use all the functionalities with the keyboard

themes: As a keyboard user, I want to browse with keyboard only
items.title: Make the focus pathway sequential and logical without keyboard trap
attendu: As a keyboard user, I can browse logically and sequentially without keyboard trap in the page with keyboard
gestion: The focus pathway thought the page is logical and make sense
acceptance:
Given that I browse with keyboard

WhenI'm in the page

Then the focus order of the elements (buttons, links, form fields...) is consistent and logical (often equivalent to the visual order) without keyboard trap

themes: As a keyboard user, I want to browse with keyboard only
items.title: Provide a visible focus
attendu: As a keyboard user, I want to identify the focus indicator
gestion: The focus is always visible (for example, the CSS property outline has a minimum size >1px)
The contrast level is at least of 3:1 between the focus indicator and the background color
acceptance:
Given that I browse with keyboard

When the focus is on an interactive

Then the focus is visible enough and the contrast level is sufficient between the focus indicator and the background color

themes: As a disabled user, I want to use a Single Page Application (SAP)
items.title: Maintain adequate page title and headings
attendu: As a screen reader user, I want to identify a change in context/content/page with a page title and headings
gestion: Voir la User Story 'titre de page'
Voir la User Story 'titre de rubrique'
acceptance:
Given that I able to identify changes in context/content/page je dois pouvoir identifier chaque changement de contexte/contenu/page

When they happen

Then the page title is unique and pertinent And headings are also pertinent without skip in hierarchy level

themes: As a disabled user, I want to use a Single Page Application (SAP)
items.title: Allow a dynamic focus management une gestion dynamique et un parcours logique du focus
attendu: As an user naviguant au clavier, je bénéficie d'une gestion dynamique et parcours logique du focus
acceptance:
Given that je dois pouvoir naviguer au clavier

When se produisent des changements de contexte/contenu/page

Then le focus se positionne de façon dynamique et son parcours reste logique
dev: Rendre le parcours du focus logique
